patthana24.13:1.1_0: Nasārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.13:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.13:2.1_0: Naanārammaṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.13:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
